message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a starting price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you consider adjusting the price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I'm eager to make a deal, I can't go as low as $15,000.  Would you consider $18,000?  I'm confident you'll see a return on this investment.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering my budget constraints, I am unable to meet your current offer of $18,000. However, I am willing to pay $16,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
